resources.string: Please give a nickname to identify your phone at webkey.cc
Only alphabetic characters and numbers are allowed.
Unable to register the username to the server.
If your 3g internet provider blocks the access to your phone, you can reach it through

This program contains two parts: this is a JAVA front end to manage the C++ server. If you click on "Start service" it should see: "Your phone is available at:" with an IP address (if not, then try to use other port and ensure you have root privileges).

If you can connect using this IP address, then your phone can have an address like http://myphone.homeip.net by using DynDNS service (see http://dyndns.org), or http://webkey.cc/yourname by using our server (that's the fun part, you don't have to know the phone's IP address).

If you can't connect using the IP address (your 3g internet provider must block the incoming connection to your phone or your phone is behind a NAT, firewall or proxy) then use our server webkey.cc to redirect the connection. This way the phone opens a connection to our server, which should work whenever you have internet connection.

You can add a new user in your browser under menu "Config", or use the button "Users' config".

For more information, contact details and source code visit our page: http://webkey.cc

Some internet providers block only the port 80, and the phone is accessable on the port 8080.

Translations: 
German (Deutsch): Christian Wallert, Artur Pogoda de la Vega, René Sauer
Español (Spanish): Roberto Yoldi
Greek: Ilias Gerasimou

Installation of binaries has failed, please restart the phone and try again.
The phone is not rooted or have not "su" program.
A new user wants to access your phone.
A new new user wants to access your phone.
Are you sure you want to delete this user?
All other permissions. Additionally, user can inject keys, inject touch events, run commands, run commands in terminal, view log. These functions are not accessable by any of the other permissions.
View GPS and network location of the phone. The GPS is only available if it is enabled in your phone\'s Settings. Network location depends on your carrier.
Read and write messages. Every message are in the same list, and everyone can empty that list.

If this permission is set and the permission "Read files" is not, then under the menu "Files" only the content of /sdcard/public will be available for read. Please create that directory if you are about to use this function.
Read personal data such as contacts, messages and call list.
Read all files on the phone. Be careful, the contacts, messages, call list and the passwords of Webkey are stored in files!
Read and modify the content of the sdcard.
Installing new binaries was failed, please restart your phone and try again.
Set the remote phone\'s IP address or nickname at Webkey service
This feature is not available on this phone
